short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows Rate My Professors ratings alongside professor's name in WashU course listing page base on mouse hovering.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Version 0.0.2
- Improve search accuracy by not using middle name in query string.
- Fix the issue that multiple fetch requests were sent for a single professor full name query.

Version 0.0.3
- Fix the "Something Went Wrong" issue due to the change to RMP website.
- Perform a second search by last name when searching by full name returns no result.
- Add professors' names to the tooltip.

Version 0.0.4 (Oct 14, 2023)
- Fix issues caused by changes of RMP's search url pattern.



This lightweight, fast extension aims to improve WashU students' course registration experience. It helps students get professors' ratings in seconds without manual searches.

If the selected professor's profile exists, the extension injects a tooltip containing the rating, would-take-again-percentage, difficulty, and the link to the professor's page on the RMP website. This extension only works on the WashU course listing page and it doesn't require login.

Instruction:
1) Install WashU RateMyProfessor Extension.
2) Hover the mouse over the professor's name on the WashU course listing website.
